clear
[H[2J[3J*******************************
*                             *
*                             *
* [0] Remove COMPILER program *
*                             *
*                             *
*******************************
rm -rf COMPILER


************************************************************
*                                                          *
*                                                          *
* [1] Remove *.class files and JFlex-CUP generated files:  *
*                                                          *
*     Lexer.java                                           *
*     Parser.java                                          *
*     TokenNames.java                                      *
*                                                          *
************************************************************
rm -rf /specific/a/home/cc/students/cs/chenmizrahi2/compilation/ex5/src/Lexer.java /specific/a/home/cc/students/cs/chenmizrahi2/compilation/ex5/src/Parser.java /specific/a/home/cc/students/cs/chenmizrahi2/compilation/ex5/src/TokenNames.java /specific/a/home/cc/students/cs/chenmizrahi2/compilation/ex5/bin/*.class /specific/a/home/cc/students/cs/chenmizrahi2/compilation/ex5/bin/*/*.class


************************************************************
*                                                          *
*                                                          *
* [2] Use JFlex to synthesize Lexer.java from LEX_FILE.lex *
*                                                          *
*                                                          *
************************************************************
jflex -q -d /specific/a/home/cc/students/cs/chenmizrahi2/compilation/ex5/src /specific/a/home/cc/students/cs/chenmizrahi2/compilation/ex5/jflex/LEX_FILE.lex


*******************************************************************************
*                                                                             *
*                                                                             *
* [3] Use CUP to synthesize Parser.java and TokenNames.java from CUP_FILE.cup *
*                                                                             *
*                                                                             *
*******************************************************************************
java -jar /specific/a/home/cc/students/cs/chenmizrahi2/compilation/ex5/external_jars/java-cup-11b.jar -nowarn -parser  Parser -symbols TokenNames -destdir /specific/a/home/cc/students/cs/chenmizrahi2/compilation/ex5/src /specific/a/home/cc/students/cs/chenmizrahi2/compilation/ex5/cup/CUP_FILE.cup


********************************************************
*                                                      *
*                                                      *
* [4] Create *.class files from *.java files + CUP JAR *
*                                                      *
*                                                      *
********************************************************
mkdir -p /specific/a/home/cc/students/cs/chenmizrahi2/compilation/ex5/bin
javac -cp /specific/a/home/cc/students/cs/chenmizrahi2/compilation/ex5/external_jars/java-cup-11b-runtime.jar -d /specific/a/home/cc/students/cs/chenmizrahi2/compilation/ex5/bin /specific/a/home/cc/students/cs/chenmizrahi2/compilation/ex5/src/*.java /specific/a/home/cc/students/cs/chenmizrahi2/compilation/ex5/src/*/*.java
